text: [Music]
hello welcome to English for everyone
today we are talking about this
important structure and it's one of the
most common mistakes my students make in
the class because this structure is very
different in many languages so let's
take a closer look my house is messy
it's not clean I need to clean my house
but I'm very tired
so I don't want to clean my house
usually when you have two actions we
need connector to need to clean you have
two actions we need connector to I need
to clean my house
do you need to clean your house respond
good one to clean you have two actions
use connected to I don't want to clean
my house I'm very tired do you want to
clean your house respond good the house
is missing I'm very tired I don't want
to clean the house but I have kids I
want them to clean the house I want them
to clean the house is correct
I want that they clean the house is not
correct let's take a closer look at the
structure we have our action wand we
have a person before the action we have
a person after the action when we start
a sentence we say I you he she it we
they the person after the action is
different I want him we want her
remember her he and she we say once he
wants me she wants them and we have two
actions use connector - for example I
have their kids I want them to clean the
house let's look at some examples I have
a daughter I want her to wash the dishes
I want her one is our action
we start our sentence with I I want her
so we don't say she we say her I want
her we have two actions want and wash
remember to use connector to I want her
to wash the dishes
I want that she washes the dishes is not
correct do you want her to wash the
dishes to respond good I'm tired I don't
want to clean my house I don't want to
take out the trash but I have a son I
want him to take out the trash
so remember I want him we have two
actions one take use connector two I
want him to take out the trash
I want that he takes out the trash is
not correct do you want him to take out
the trash respond good I don't want to
sweep the floor
I have husband I want him to sweep the
floor so remember I want him I want him
and use connector two because you have
two actions I want him to sweep the
floor
I want that his whoops the floor is not

house is messy I don't want to clean the

clean the house so remember if it's one
person one boy one man I want him if
it's her girl was it out on her but I
have three kids I want them I want them
to clean the house and remember you have
two actions use connector - I want them
to clean the house
I want to thank link the house is not
correct do you want them to clean the

and I don't want to clean my house what
does my husband want me to do my husband
wants me to relax he wants that I
relaxed is not correct he wants me to

wife want you to do respond okay
my kids want me to make eggs for
breakfast or you can say they they want
